dctSection.title: Let's take a glance at DCT
dctSection.subTitle: Digital Cloud Technology
dctSection.description: We are a group of companies which is offering many services such as Asxox Shop & App, Digital Marketing, Warehouse Logistics, Software Development, SY Real Estate Agency, and DCT Event Lottery.

asxoxSection.title: About our Asxox Shop & App
asxoxSection.subTitle: Asxox Shop and App Feature
asxoxSection.description: We are one of the best online shopping platforms in Myanmar, which is offering our best service to our customers. We are serving 24/7 customer sevices to help and solve the problems of our customers.

list.listItemOne: Comprehensive quality control and affordable prices
list.listItemTwo: Fast and convenient door to door delivery

sySection.title: About SY Real Estate Agency
sySection.subTitle: Our Agency Background & Services
sySection.description: We are one of the real estate agencies in Myanmar which is making people lives smooth and convenient with the most suitable and affordable housings, apartments, and etc. If you are to rent or buy a house or apartment, don't think twice, just contact us right away.

list.listItemOne: Convienent, smooth process and affordable prices
list.listItemTwo: Good quality accomodations with fair prices

dctLotterySection.title: DCT Event Lottery
dctLotterySection.subTitle: How our lottery system works
dctLotterySection.description: Our lottery tickets are everywhere you go, and when you buy something from the shops in partnership with us, you will get a free ticket to win the lottery. The more ticket you collect, the higher chance to win the big prizes.

dctAppSection.title: Easy scan & buy with DCT App
dctAppSection.subTitle: Our app features include these:

list.listItemOne: Fast, secure mobile application with easy scan and buy feature
list.listItemTwo: Clean and user-centered design with easy accessiblity
list.listItemThree: Amazing features to enhance your user experiences

footer.description: DCT is a group of companies which include many functionalities and services to make people lives convenient and comfortable. We are always thriving to be one of the most famous group of companies in Myanmar, building up company profile.
